Text:
Huge improvement over 4.1 that I used in my CCNA course. 

5.3 Allows you to configure dynamic ACLs, which older version had trouble with. 

VMPS support still not present :( 

Great tool if you are studying for CCNA... Anything more advanced probably requires an actual lab with higher-end gear.

Oh, and THANK YOU for the upload! 

I will see if I still have any of my old labs saved from CCNA, but chances are I deleted them after the course. If I still have any, they're yours.

Your very much welcome. If you want me to throw any pt's on a seed box and let them go on tpb please let me know. 

Thanks. 

Seed & Enjoy.

Thanks!
Been looking for a program like this, really helpful :)
